title: Your 2016 Season in Review not working for my account
body:
So I was trying to log into the Your 2016 Season in Review to check out my stats and what not, but when I go to the page it just shows me the general stats page rather than my personal stats, I've tried with an account on NA and it worked, I asked my friend on OCE to log into his account and it worked, for whatever reason it seems like just my specif account isn't logging in.

Anyone know whats going on or have a similar issue?

replies.body: Yeah, mine doesnt work either. It just refreshes the page for me

I have the same problem. It comes up with "Login to review" (even when I'm already logged in) and clicking the button briefly opens the correct page, but then immediately returns to the same page before anything actually loads. It's really frustrating.
How buy a skin project yasuo
go to the in review page "https://review2016.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/year-in-review/personal-stats" and change the link from "2016.na.league" to "2016.oce.league" ,that worked for me :D
